verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H7462>them,<s%> even to the shepherds, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7462>themselves!<s%> Shouldn't the shepherds <S%H7462>feed<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep?<s%>

You <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> and you <S%H3847>clothe<s%> yourself with the <S%H6785>wool,<s%> you <S%H2076>kill<s%> the <S%H1277>fatlings;<s%> but you <S%H1277>don't<s%> feed the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>

You <S%H2388>haven't<s%> strengthened the <S%H2470>diseased,<s%> neither have you <S%H7495>healed<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick,<s%> neither have you bound <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> neither have you brought <S%H7725>back<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away,<s%> neither have you <S%H1245>sought<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost;<s%> but with <S%H2394>force<s%> and with <S%H6531>rigor<s%> you have ruled over <S%H7287>them.<s%>

They were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd;<s%> and they became <S%H402>food<s%> to all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and were <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

My <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7686>wandered<s%> through all the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and on every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill:<s%> <S%H6629>yes,<s%> my sheep were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> on all the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and there was none who <S%H1875>searched<s%> or <S%H1245>sought.<s%>
<S%H7462>Therefore,<s%> you shepherds, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> surely because my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> became a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> became <S%H402>food<s%> to all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> because there was no <S%H7462>shepherd,<s%> neither did my <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H1875>search<s%> for my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> but the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> <S%H7462>themselves,<s%> and didn't feed my <S%H6629>sheep;<s%>
<S%H7462>therefore,<s%> you shepherds, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H7462>Behold,<s%> I am against the shepherds; and I will <S%H1875>require<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cause them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> neither shall the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> themselves any <S%H5337>more;<s%> and I will deliver my <S%H6629>sheep<s%> from their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> that they may not be food for <S%H402>them.<s%>
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1875>Behold,<s%> I myself, even I, will search for my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and will seek them <S%H1239>out.<s%>

As a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> seeks <S%H1243>out<s%> his <S%H5739>flock<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he is <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep<s%> that are <S%H6567>scattered<s%> <S%H1239>abroad,<s%> so will I seek out my <S%H6629>sheep;<s%> and I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them out of all <S%H4725>places<s%> where they have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> and <S%H6205>dark<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

I will bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from the <S%H776>countries,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land;<s%> and I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> by the <S%H650>watercourses,<s%> and in all the inhabited <S%H4186>places<s%> of the <S%H776>country.<s%>

I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture;<s%> and on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall their <S%H5116>fold<s%> <S%H7257>be:<s%> there shall they lie down in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5116>fold;<s%> and on <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> shall they <S%H7462>feed<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
I myself will be the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and I will cause them to lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> that which was <S%H6>lost,<s%> and will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> that which was driven <S%H5080>away,<s%> and will bind <S%H2280>up<s%> that which was <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and will <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> that which was <S%H2470>sick:<s%> but the <S%H8082>fat<s%> and the <S%H2389>strong<s%> I will <S%H8045>destroy;<s%> I will <S%H7462>feed<s%> them in <S%H4941>justice.<s%>

As for <S%H859>you,<s%> O my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H8199>Behold,<s%> I judge between <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> the <S%H352>rams<s%> and the male <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

Does it seem a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> to you to have <S%H7462>fed<s%> on the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> but you must tread <S%H7429>down<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of your <S%H4829>pasture?<s%> and to have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> of the <S%H4950>clear<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> but you must <S%H7515>foul<s%> the <S%H3498>residue<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet?<s%>

As for my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> they <S%H7462>eat<s%> that which you have <S%H4823>trodden<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and they <S%H8354>drink<s%> that which you have <S%H4833>fouled<s%> with your <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H8199>them:<s%> Behold, I, even I, will judge between the <S%H1274>fat<s%> <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and the <S%H7330>lean<s%> <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

Because you <S%H1920>thrust<s%> with <S%H6654>side<s%> and with <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H5055>push<s%> all the <S%H2470>diseased<s%> with your <S%H7161>horns,<s%> until you have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them <S%H2351>abroad;<s%>
therefore will I <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and they shall no more be a <S%H957>prey;<s%> and I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H7716>sheep<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep.<s%>

I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> over <S%H7462>them,<s%> and he shall feed <S%H5650>them,<s%> even my servant <S%H1732>David;<s%> he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H7462>them,<s%> and he shall be their shepherd.
<S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, will be their <S%H430>God,<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3068>them;<s%> I, Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>

I will <S%H3772>make<s%> with them a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and will cause <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out of the <S%H776>land;<s%> and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> in the <S%H3293>woods.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them and the places <S%H5439>around<s%> my <S%H1389>hill<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> and I will cause the <S%H1653>shower<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> in its <S%H6256>season;<s%> there shall be <S%H1653>showers<s%> of <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>

The <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and they shall be <S%H983>secure<s%> in their <S%H127>land;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bars<s%> of their <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who made slaves of <S%H5647>them.<s%>

They shall no more be a <S%H957>prey<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> neither shall the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3427>them;<s%> but they shall dwell <S%H983>securely,<s%> and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> to them a <S%H4302>plantation<s%> for <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and they shall be no more <S%H622>consumed<s%> with <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> neither <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H3639>shame<s%> of the nations any <S%H1471>more.<s%>

They shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, their <S%H430>God<s%> am with <S%H1004>them,<s%> and that they, the house of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H859>You<s%> my <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of my <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and I am your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
